name.ch: 軟體定義無線電平台技術

goal.en: To nurture the techniques for setting up and application of the practical Software-Defined Radio platform (Zedboard + AD9361)
goal.ch: 講解實務軟體定義無線電平台(Zedboard + AD9361)建置之相關軟硬體技術

content.en:
週次 內容 備註
1 Xilinx Vivado Development Environment-1
2 Xilinx Vivado Development Environment-2
3 Hardware Description Language: Verilog-1
4 Hardware Description Language: Verilog-2
5 Arm AMBA (Advanced Microcontroller Bus Architecture) AXI, AXI-Lite and AXIS Specification-1
6 Arm AMBA (Advanced Microcontroller Bus Architecture) AXI, AXI-Lite and AXIS Specification-2
7 Zynq Processor Architecture-1
8 Zynq Processor Architecture-2
9 Zedboard Architecture and Schematics-1
10 Zedboard Architecture and Schematics-2
11 Zynq Hardware and Software Co-Design: SDK, PYNQ-Jupyter-1
12 Zynq Hardware and Software Co-Design: SDK, PYNQ-Jupyter-2
13 RF Frontend: AD9361
14 SDR TX/RX Mechanism-1
15 SDR TX/RX Mechanism-2
16 Standard Peripherals Interface-1: UART, SPI, I2C, I2S, SPDIF, USB, CAN, Ethernet, SDIO
17 Standard Peripherals Interface-2: UART, SPI, I2C, I2S, SPDIF, USB, CAN, Ethernet, SDIO
18 Final Term Project
